hits.title: On Open Scholarship
hits.description: An essay on the nature of open scholarship and the role of the library in supporting it.
hits.content: This is the content of the essay. It is a long essay, and it is very interesting. It is also very well-written and well-argued and well-researched and well-documented and well-cited
